articles.author: Alexander Abnos and The Athletic Staff
articles.title: Why did the USWNT-Canada match continue? Explaining the rules around postponing games - The Athletic
articles.description: Norht American soccer has a long history of playing on despite conditions, though postponements do occasionally happen
articles.content: American soccer has dealt with two high-profile instances of extreme weather disrupting professional games in the last week. In both cases, despite conditions making it impossible to play at anything… [+8331 chars]
